Rooted in Our Credo, the values of DEI fuel our pursuit to create a healthier, more equitable world. Our diverse workforce and culture of belonging accelerate innovation to solve the world’s most pressing healthcare challenges. We know that the success of our business – and our ability to deliver meaningful solutions – depends on how well we understand and meet the diverse needs of the communities we serve. Which is why we foster a culture of inclusion and belonging where all perspectives, abilities and experiences are valued, and our people can reach their potential. At Johnson & Johnson, we all belong.At Johnson & Johnson MedTech, we are working to solve the world’s most pressing healthcare challenges through innovations at the intersection of biology and technology. We harness our deep expertise in surgery, orthopedics, vision, and interventional solutions to design healthcare solutions that are smarter, less invasive, and more personalized. The MedTech Surgery organization was recently established to combine Ethicon’s market-leading surgical portfolio with the Robotics & Digital Solutions portfolio. The MedTech Surgical organization is comprised of: Wound Closure & Healing and Biosurgery, Endo Mechanical and Energy, OTTAVA (Surgical Robotics), MONARCH (Flexible Robotics), and MedTech Digital.Our Manager, QA Preclinical auditor is responsible for applying the Good Laboratory Practice regulations to help the company achieve two major objectives in support of the J&J Credo: Meet and exceed the expectations of our customers; and achieve and maintain compliance with regulatory expectations. To support business objectives, a successful Manager, QA Preclinical Auditor will have orientation to the big picture and attention to detail. Are you interested in joining a team that is developing the next generation of innovative devices that serve our surgeons and patients? Securing the Future of the UK Food Industry: The Strategic Role of ApprenticeshipsWith the UK food and beverage sector employing over half a million people and contributing £38 billion to the economy annually, the industry’s success depends on a skilled, future-ready workforce. Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Share your insights.hashtag#FoodIndustry hashtag#Apprenticeships hashtag#SkillsDevelopment hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#TalentPipeline

Inspection services are provided by IBTS to third-party stakeholders to ensure compliance with relevant codes and standards, including electrical, building, mechanical, manufacturers installation instructions, and industry best practices.A person in this position is expected to effectively demonstrate the following: Expertise in Solar Photovoltaic (PV) technologies and best practices applicable to installations of same, including ability to recognize quality standards, best practices and methods associated with such installations. Knowledge as to the practical application of corresponding building, electrical, and fire codes applicable to solar PV installations. Professionalism in customer communication and relations with all levels of clients and their customers, and coworkers. Ability to work effectively with a diverse group of stakeholders Ability to successfully complete projects on time. Perform scheduled quality assurance (QA) inspections for solar PV systems in accordance with defined service level expectations. Ensure timely performance of inspections as determined by client agreements and communicated by the Project Manager and others. Perform QA inspections and audits of residential and commercial solar photovoltaic system installations. Inspect solar photovoltaic system installations, properties, and equipment for compliance with plans, specifications, and manufacturer requirements. Document the inspection results providing a full and complete photo set taken to illustrate the installation and all findings made on-site. Provide concise notes and descriptions to accompany photographic documentation of any identified quality issues, including those having deficiencies requiring corrective action. Complete and submit applicable inspection report along with a complete photo set and notes within 3 days of scheduled inspection date. Maintain data on residential PV products, installation instructions, test methods, and other documents as deemed appropriate and necessary for informed completion of the work. Must stay continually educated in solar product changes and code requirements. Participate in scheduled calls as provided or directed by Project Manager and others. Obtain and maintain certifications and/or licenses, as required to successfully complete the work as an industry recognized subject matter expert. Qualifications Must have a valid Driver’s License and reliable vehicle transportation Excellent organizational skills and attention to details Own and be able to operate with efficiency and ease: cell phone, digital camera, and computer with internet access. We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. The new state-of-the-art facility is located in Holly Springs, North Carolina, United States.Job Description:What You’ll Do Performs SME role within the QA team for onboarding and approving raw materials Reviews and assesses change controls, deviations, and investigations Performs SME role within the QA team for the development of documents, processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Provides QA oversight and support of project deliverables in accordance with governing processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Assesses the impact of system and process modifications and maintains oversight of change management processes to ensure laboratory systems are first validated, and then maintained in a validated state through site startup and into commercial operations Provides oversight and approval of laboratory system and process lifecycle documentation, including risk and impact assessments, product, process and eq

I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. This includes beyond phone support in another city.Generally, why is the conflation considered dangerous?- Genuine victims of exploitation are seen as sex workers, which is inappropriate- Sex workers' autonomy and consent is decided for us and removed- Allows others (especially women) to speak over sex workers because they're seen as victims who are too traumatised and need someone to speak for "the voiceless"- Consent - the biggest difference- Ignores the boundaries set by the sex worker themselves- Sex workers not believed when genuinely exploited because it's seen as all the same - IF WE BELIEVE WHEN SOMEONE SAYS THEYRE RAPED, WE MUST BELIEVE IT WHEN THEY SAY THEY ARE NOT

Configuration Management Expertise: Lead technical discussions and guide decision-making around configuration management for complex capital equipment, including hardware, software, and systems, ensuring best practices are followed throughout the lifecycle. Collaboration: Work alongside other project leads within the Capital Equipment QA portfolio to define a unified approach to configuration management-addressing inputs, considerations, outputs, and decisions across the equipment lifecycle. Documentation Development: Lead the creation and maintenance of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Work Instructions, and Guidance documents to ensure consistency and compliance across configuration management activities. די נמאס!!!!📩 "אני שולחת מלא קו"ח ותיקי עבודות ואף אחד לא חוזר אליי..."🤯 "יש כל כך הרבה מועמדים, אבל אף אחד לא מתאים..."אם אתם מחפשי עבודה או מגייסים, בטח המשפטים האלה נשמעים לכם מוכרים.אז אולי די כבר?!🎯 הגיע הזמן לשנות את המשחק!מגייסים ומגייסות – בואו נהיה אלה שמובילים שינוי אמיתי.בחייאת, הרי כולם יעידו שהם "Team players" - אז אולי פשוט תדייקו את החיפוש שלכם?! החל ממחר, כשתפרסמו מודעת דרושים/ות, תוודאו שהיא כוללת:✅ תיאור של החברה – מי אתם ולמה שירצו לעבוד אצלכם?✅ דרישות ריאליות – איזה רקע, ידע קודם או השכלה נדרשים?✅ תיאור העבודה בפועל – מה בת'כלס עושים ביום-יום?✅ ממשקים – למי כפופים? עם צריך לעבוד? (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Securing the Future of the UK Food Industry: The Strategic Role of ApprenticeshipsWith the UK food and beverage sector employing over half a million people and contributing £38 billion to the economy annually, the industry’s success depends on a skilled, future-ready workforce. Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Share your insights.hashtag#FoodIndustry hashtag#Apprenticeships hashtag#SkillsDevelopment hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#TalentPipeline

Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. The new state-of-the-art facility is located in Holly Springs, North Carolina, United States.Job Description:What You’ll Do Performs SME role within the QA team for onboarding and approving raw materials Reviews and assesses change controls, deviations, and investigations Performs SME role within the QA team for the development of documents, processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Provides QA oversight and support of project deliverables in accordance with governing processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Assesses the impact of system and process modifications and maintains oversight of change management processes to ensure laboratory systems are first validated, and then maintained in a validated state through site startup and into commercial operations Provides oversight and approval of laboratory system and process lifecycle documentation, including risk and impact assessments, product, process and eq

I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. This includes beyond phone support in another city.Generally, why is the conflation considered dangerous?- Genuine victims of exploitation are seen as sex workers, which is inappropriate- Sex workers' autonomy and consent is decided for us and removed- Allows others (especially women) to speak over sex workers because they're seen as victims who are too traumatised and need someone to speak for "the voiceless"- Consent - the biggest difference- Ignores the boundaries set by the sex worker themselves- Sex workers not believed when genuinely exploited because it's seen as all the same - IF WE BELIEVE WHEN SOMEONE SAYS THEYRE RAPED, WE MUST BELIEVE IT WHEN THEY SAY THEY ARE NOT

Configuration Management Expertise: Lead technical discussions and guide decision-making around configuration management for complex capital equipment, including hardware, software, and systems, ensuring best practices are followed throughout the lifecycle. Collaboration: Work alongside other project leads within the Capital Equipment QA portfolio to define a unified approach to configuration management-addressing inputs, considerations, outputs, and decisions across the equipment lifecycle. Documentation Development: Lead the creation and maintenance of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Work Instructions, and Guidance documents to ensure consistency and compliance across configuration management activities. די נמאס!!!!📩 "אני שולחת מלא קו"ח ותיקי עבודות ואף אחד לא חוזר אליי..."🤯 "יש כל כך הרבה מועמדים, אבל אף אחד לא מתאים..."אם אתם מחפשי עבודה או מגייסים, בטח המשפטים האלה נשמעים לכם מוכרים.אז אולי די כבר?!🎯 הגיע הזמן לשנות את המשחק!מגייסים ומגייסות – בואו נהיה אלה שמובילים שינוי אמיתי.בחייאת, הרי כולם יעידו שהם "Team players" - אז אולי פשוט תדייקו את החיפוש שלכם?! החל ממחר, כשתפרסמו מודעת דרושים/ות, תוודאו שהיא כוללת:✅ תיאור של החברה – מי אתם ולמה שירצו לעבוד אצלכם?✅ דרישות ריאליות – איזה רקע, ידע קודם או השכלה נדרשים?✅ תיאור העבודה בפועל – מה בת'כלס עושים ביום-יום?✅ ממשקים – למי כפופים? עם צריך לעבוד? (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Securing the Future of the UK Food Industry: The Strategic Role of ApprenticeshipsWith the UK food and beverage sector employing over half a million people and contributing £38 billion to the economy annually, the industry’s success depends on a skilled, future-ready workforce. Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Share your insights.hashtag#FoodIndustry hashtag#Apprenticeships hashtag#SkillsDevelopment hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#TalentPipeline

Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. The new state-of-the-art facility is located in Holly Springs, North Carolina, United States.Job Description:What You’ll Do Performs SME role within the QA team for onboarding and approving raw materials Reviews and assesses change controls, deviations, and investigations Performs SME role within the QA team for the development of documents, processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Provides QA oversight and support of project deliverables in accordance with governing processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Assesses the impact of system and process modifications and maintains oversight of change management processes to ensure laboratory systems are first validated, and then maintained in a validated state through site startup and into commercial operations Provides oversight and approval of laboratory system and process lifecycle documentation, including risk and impact assessments, product, process and eq

I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. This includes beyond phone support in another city.Generally, why is the conflation considered dangerous?- Genuine victims of exploitation are seen as sex workers, which is inappropriate- Sex workers' autonomy and consent is decided for us and removed- Allows others (especially women) to speak over sex workers because they're seen as victims who are too traumatised and need someone to speak for "the voiceless"- Consent - the biggest difference- Ignores the boundaries set by the sex worker themselves- Sex workers not believed when genuinely exploited because it's seen as all the same - IF WE BELIEVE WHEN SOMEONE SAYS THEYRE RAPED, WE MUST BELIEVE IT WHEN THEY SAY THEY ARE NOT

Configuration Management Expertise: Lead technical discussions and guide decision-making around configuration management for complex capital equipment, including hardware, software, and systems, ensuring best practices are followed throughout the lifecycle. Collaboration: Work alongside other project leads within the Capital Equipment QA portfolio to define a unified approach to configuration management-addressing inputs, considerations, outputs, and decisions across the equipment lifecycle. Documentation Development: Lead the creation and maintenance of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Work Instructions, and Guidance documents to ensure consistency and compliance across configuration management activities. די נמאס!!!!📩 "אני שולחת מלא קו"ח ותיקי עבודות ואף אחד לא חוזר אליי..."🤯 "יש כל כך הרבה מועמדים, אבל אף אחד לא מתאים..."אם אתם מחפשי עבודה או מגייסים, בטח המשפטים האלה נשמעים לכם מוכרים.אז אולי די כבר?!🎯 הגיע הזמן לשנות את המשחק!מגייסים ומגייסות – בואו נהיה אלה שמובילים שינוי אמיתי.בחייאת, הרי כולם יעידו שהם "Team players" - אז אולי פשוט תדייקו את החיפוש שלכם?! החל ממחר, כשתפרסמו מודעת דרושים/ות, תוודאו שהיא כוללת:✅ תיאור של החברה – מי אתם ולמה שירצו לעבוד אצלכם?✅ דרישות ריאליות – איזה רקע, ידע קודם או השכלה נדרשים?✅ תיאור העבודה בפועל – מה בת'כלס עושים ביום-יום?✅ ממשקים – למי כפופים? עם צריך לעבוד? (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. The new state-of-the-art facility is located in Holly Springs, North Carolina, United States.Job Description:What You’ll Do Performs SME role within the QA team for onboarding and approving raw materials Reviews and assesses change controls, deviations, and investigations Performs SME role within the QA team for the development of documents, processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Provides QA oversight and support of project deliverables in accordance with governing processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Assesses the impact of system and process modifications and maintains oversight of change management processes to ensure laboratory systems are first validated, and then maintained in a validated state through site startup and into commercial operations Provides oversight and approval of laboratory system and process lifecycle documentation, including risk and impact assessments, product, process and eq

I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. This includes beyond phone support in another city.Generally, why is the conflation considered dangerous?- Genuine victims of exploitation are seen as sex workers, which is inappropriate- Sex workers' autonomy and consent is decided for us and removed- Allows others (especially women) to speak over sex workers because they're seen as victims who are too traumatised and need someone to speak for "the voiceless"- Consent - the biggest difference- Ignores the boundaries set by the sex worker themselves- Sex workers not believed when genuinely exploited because it's seen as all the same - IF WE BELIEVE WHEN SOMEONE SAYS THEYRE RAPED, WE MUST BELIEVE IT WHEN THEY SAY THEY ARE NOT

This position will play a key role in leading a strategic project related to Capital Equipment Configuration Management, which involves hardware, software, and systems configuration management. As the Technical Lead, you will partner closely with a Project Manager and work with cross-functional teams to help bring best-in-class practices related to configuration management into our Quality processes for capital equipment.This role will offer you the opportunity to engage with a diverse group of stakeholders, from engineers to leadership, across multiple divisions. You will help establish a unified approach to configuration management that spans the entire lifecycle of capital equipment, ensuring that our processes, policies, and systems are aligned with the highest standards of quality, compliance, and operational efficiency.Your responsibilities will include: Project Leadership: Serve as the Technical Lead for a strategic project focused on Capital Equipment Configuration Management, involving hardware, software, and systems configuration management, partnering with a Project Manager and cross-functional teams to drive successful outcomes. Configuration Management Expertise: Lead technical discussions and guide decision-making around configuration management for complex capital equipment, including hardware, software, and systems, ensuring best practices are followed throughout the lifecycle. Collaboration: Work alongside other project leads within the Capital Equipment QA portfolio to define a unified approach to configuration management-addressing inputs, considerations, outputs, and decisions across the equipment lifecycle. Documentation Development: Lead the creation and maintenance of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Work Instructions, and Guidance documents to ensure consistency and compliance across configuration management activities. Stakeholder Management: Lead a cross-functional, cross-divisional stakeholder group, including engineers, quality professionals, and senior leadership, to ensure alignmen

די נמאס!!!!📩 "אני שולחת מלא קו"ח ותיקי עבודות ואף אחד לא חוזר אליי..."🤯 "יש כל כך הרבה מועמדים, אבל אף אחד לא מתאים..."אם אתם מחפשי עבודה או מגייסים, בטח המשפטים האלה נשמעים לכם מוכרים.אז אולי די כבר?!🎯 הגיע הזמן לשנות את המשחק!מגייסים ומגייסות – בואו נהיה אלה שמובילים שינוי אמיתי.בחייאת, הרי כולם יעידו שהם "Team players" - אז אולי פשוט תדייקו את החיפוש שלכם?! החל ממחר, כשתפרסמו מודעת דרושים/ות, תוודאו שהיא כוללת:✅ תיאור של החברה – מי אתם ולמה שירצו לעבוד אצלכם?✅ דרישות ריאליות – איזה רקע, ידע קודם או השכלה נדרשים?✅ תיאור העבודה בפועל – מה בת'כלס עושים ביום-יום?✅ ממשקים – למי כפופים? עם צריך לעבוד? (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Securing the Future of the UK Food Industry: The Strategic Role of ApprenticeshipsWith the UK food and beverage sector employing over half a million people and contributing £38 billion to the economy annually, the industry’s success depends on a skilled, future-ready workforce. Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. The new state-of-the-art facility is located in Holly Springs, North Carolina, United States.Job Description:What You’ll Do Performs SME role within the QA team for onboarding and approving raw materials Reviews and assesses change controls, deviations, and investigations Performs SME role within the QA team for the development of documents, processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Provides QA oversight and support of project deliverables in accordance with governing processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Assesses the impact of system and process modifications and maintains oversight of change management processes to ensure laboratory systems are first validated, and then maintained in a validated state through site startup and into commercial operations Provides oversight and approval of laboratory system and process lifecycle documentation, including risk and impact assessments, product, process and eq

I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

What a week with AI at Rohlik Tech Team! The speed at which we’re adopting and integrating AI tools is truly game-changing. A huge shoutout to Richard for leading the initiative:🚀 Code Development Assistants – We’ve equipped many engineers with Cursor and experimented with Windsurf, VS Cline, and Junie by IntelliJ. The impact?• 15% faster development in mobile domain• 50% acceleration in unit test co-generation🔍 Code Review Assistance – Big wins here with CodeRabbit, GitLab Duo, and a pilot with local-based Callstack.ai. Results so far:• 30% reduction in review time• Eliminating the need for an extra reviewer🎨 AI-Driven UI Prototyping – tested rapid prototyping new UIs using Builder.io, directly integrating with Figma.In addition to that we are automating QA and other domains (stay tuned!).On top of all that, I had a great dinner with Jakub, who showed me how they’re using Devin.ai to automate ticket-to-PR workflows. While 80% of results are still unusable, the mindset shift among engineers is the real game-changer and you can well use the 20% :).While these are still proof of concepts, the impact we’re already seeing makes it clear—this is just the beginning. If you want to be part of the AI revolution and help us reinvent online grocery with cutting-edge tech, ping me! We’re hiring across all tech domains to lead this transformation. Post Content:
We're hashtag#Hiring: Game QA Engineer - Job title: Game QA Engineer Company: Intrepid Studios Job description: We are seeking a Game QA Engineer to join our Quality Assurance team. This role is crucial in ensuring the stability, performance, and overall quality of our games. You will work closely with developers, designers, and other QA team members to identify issues, automate testing processes, and help optimize our QA workflow.The ideal candidate has a strong technical background in testing methodologies, scripting, and debugging, with a passion for gaming and a commitment to delivering high-quality player experiences.Key Responsibilities Develop and execute automated and manual test cases for game features, mechanics, and performance. Design, implement, and maintain test automation scripts for regression, functional, and performance testing. Work closely with developers to identify, reproduce, and document bugs using bug-tracking systems like JIRA. Collaborate with Engineering and developers to understand requirements and ensure test coverage. Participate in build validation, smoke testing, and integration testing for new features and patches. Analyze logs, crashes, and performance metrics to provide detailed reports on defects. Help establish best practices for test automation, QA workflows, and game testing methodologies. Assist in load testing and stress testing. Support continuous integration \(CI\) pipelines with automated tests to ensure stability in daily builds. QualificationsRequired 5+ years of experience in game testing 2+ years as QA engineering Proficiency with bug-tracking tools \(e.g., JIRA, TestRail, Bugzilla\). Experience with scripting languages such as Python, JavaScript, or C# for test automation. Familiarity with game engines like Unreal Engine Knowledge of game development processes, including agile workflows and version control systems \(Git, Perforce, SVN\). Ability to debug issues using logs, crash reports, and debugging tools. Strong understanding of game mechanics, networking, and performance optimization. Experience testing across PC Platforms Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail. Preferred Proficiency with C++ Experience in automated custom game automation frameworks. Knowledge of network testing, server-client interactions, and online game testing methodologies. Background in load testing and stress testing for multiplayer games. Familiarity with performance profiling tools like Unreal Insights. Understanding of accessibility testing and compliance standards as it relates to laws for each component under your jurisdiction. Interview Overview:Below you’ll find an outline of the interview plan for this role. Please note that while this is what we expect the process to look like; we may ask you for supplemental information or require an additional step before making a final decision. 30 min interview with a member of our Talent Team 60 min interview with the Hiring Manager and Team Fi

We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. The new state-of-the-art facility is located in Holly Springs, North Carolina, United States.Job Description:What You’ll Do Performs SME role within the QA team for onboarding and approving raw materials Reviews and assesses change controls, deviations, and investigations Performs SME role within the QA team for the development of documents, processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Provides QA oversight and support of project deliverables in accordance with governing processes, and procedures for the QC laboratory program Assesses the impact of system and process modifications and maintains oversight of change management processes to ensure laboratory systems are first validated, and then maintained in a validated state through site startup and into commercial operations Provides oversight and approval of laboratory system and process lifecycle documentation, including risk and impact assessments, product, process and eq

I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. This includes beyond phone support in another city.Generally, why is the conflation considered dangerous?- Genuine victims of exploitation are seen as sex workers, which is inappropriate- Sex workers' autonomy and consent is decided for us and removed- Allows others (especially women) to speak over sex workers because they're seen as victims who are too traumatised and need someone to speak for "the voiceless"- Consent - the biggest difference- Ignores the boundaries set by the sex worker themselves- Sex workers not believed when genuinely exploited because it's seen as all the same - IF WE BELIEVE WHEN SOMEONE SAYS THEYRE RAPED, WE MUST BELIEVE IT WHEN THEY SAY THEY ARE NOT

די נמאס!!!!📩 "אני שולחת מלא קו"ח ותיקי עבודות ואף אחד לא חוזר אליי..."🤯 "יש כל כך הרבה מועמדים, אבל אף אחד לא מתאים..."אם אתם מחפשי עבודה או מגייסים, בטח המשפטים האלה נשמעים לכם מוכרים.אז אולי די כבר?!🎯 הגיע הזמן לשנות את המשחק!מגייסים ומגייסות – בואו נהיה אלה שמובילים שינוי אמיתי.בחייאת, הרי כולם יעידו שהם "Team players" - אז אולי פשוט תדייקו את החיפוש שלכם?! החל ממחר, כשתפרסמו מודעת דרושים/ות, תוודאו שהיא כוללת:✅ תיאור של החברה – מי אתם ולמה שירצו לעבוד אצלכם?✅ דרישות ריאליות – איזה רקע, ידע קודם או השכלה נדרשים?✅ תיאור העבודה בפועל – מה בת'כלס עושים ביום-יום?✅ ממשקים – למי כפופים? עם צריך לעבוד? (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Rooted in Our Credo, the values of DEI fuel our pursuit to create a healthier, more equitable world. We know that the success of our business – and our ability to deliver meaningful solutions – depends on how well we understand and meet the diverse needs of the communities we serve. Which is why we foster a culture of inclusion and belonging where all perspectives, abilities and experiences are valued, and our people can reach their potential. At Johnson & Johnson, we all belong.At Johnson & Johnson MedTech, we are working to solve the world’s most pressing healthcare challenges through innovations at the intersection of biology and technology. We harness our deep expertise in surgery, orthopedics, vision, and interventional solutions to design healthcare solutions that are smarter, less invasive, and more personalized. The MedTech Surgery organization was recently established to combine Ethicon’s market-leading surgical portfolio with the Robotics & Digital Solutions portfolio. The MedTech Surgical organization is comprised of: Wound Closure & Healing and Biosurgery, Endo Mechanical and Energy, OTTAVA (Surgical Robotics), MONARCH (Flexible Robotics), and MedTech Digital.Our Manager, QA Preclinical auditor is responsible for applying the Good Laboratory Practice regulations to help the company achieve two major objectives in support of the J&J Credo: Meet and exceed the expectations of our customers; and achieve and maintain compliance with regulatory expectations. To support business objectives, a successful Manager, QA Preclinical Auditor will have orientation to the big picture and attention to detail. Are you interested in joining a team that is developing the next generation of innovative devices that serve our surgeons and patients? Securing the Future of the UK Food Industry: The Strategic Role of ApprenticeshipsWith the UK food and beverage sector employing over half a million people and contributing £38 billion to the economy annually, the industry’s success depends on a skilled, future-ready workforce. Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

Assist in load testing and stress testing. Support continuous integration \(CI\) pipelines with automated tests to ensure stability in daily builds. Experience with scripting languages such as Python, JavaScript, or C# for test automation. Familiarity with game engines like Unreal Engine Knowledge of game development processes, including agile workflows and version control systems \(Git, Perforce, SVN\). Ability to debug issues using logs, crash reports, and debugging tools. Strong understanding of game mechanics, networking, and performance optimization. Experience testing across PC Platforms Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail. Preferred Proficiency with C++ Experience in automated custom game automation frameworks. Knowledge of network testing, server-client interactions, and online game testing methodologies. Background in load testing and stress testing for multiplayer games. Familiarity with performance profiling tools like Unreal Insights. Understanding of accessibility testing and compliance standards as it relates to laws for each component under your jurisdiction. We're hashtag#Hiring: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support - Job title: QA Engineer, QC Materials Support Company: Fujifilm Job description: Position Overview:The QA Engineer, Quality Control (QC) Materials Support oversees Quality Assurance during the operational phase. This role and the associated responsibilities develop as the project matures, and startup activities evolve. This role ensures systems and processes in the QC Laboratory are consistently operated and maintained in a validated state throughout their lifecycle. Emphasis is placed on policy administration and providing QA oversight for day-to-day activities, along with addressing and mitigating issues that arise during laboratory operations. Company Overview:Follow Your Genki to North America’s largest, state-of-the-art Life Science Manufacturing Facility & CDMOThe work we do at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies has never been more important—and we are looking for talented candidates to join us. We are growing our locations, our capabilities, and our teams, and looking for passionate, mission-driven people like you who want to make a real difference in people’s lives. Join FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies and help manufacture the next vaccine, cure, or gene therapy in partnership with some of the most innovative biopharma companies across the globe. We are proud to cultivate a culture that will fuel your passion, energy and drive – what we call Genki.Join usWe are growing our locations and are investing more than $2 billion into establishing a new large-scale manufacturing site for biopharmaceuticals in the United States to accelerate the growth of our Bio CDMO (Contract and Development Manufacturing Organization) business. This will be the largest end-to-end cell culture CDMO provider in North America.The new site will offer end-to-end solutions to our customers looking to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in the US. In addition to drug substance manufacture, it will also provide automated fill-finish and assembly, packaging, and labeling services. I keep having my comments removed but it's important to really bring home that Beyond the Streets, by default, conflate sex work and sexual exploitation. BtS see them as synonymous l(see comments for evidence) I thank Emily Vaughn for highlighting this, and repeatedly. Listen to SWers & not block or delete those voices that don't align with organisations.It's important when working with marginalised groups that they are able to access you and be supported to attend services. This includes beyond phone support in another city.Generally, why is the conflation considered dangerous?- Genuine victims of exploitation are seen as sex workers, which is inappropriate- Sex workers' autonomy and consent is decided for us and removed- Allows others (especially women) to speak over sex workers because they're seen as victims who are too traumatised and need someone to speak for "the voiceless"- Consent - the biggest difference- Ignores the boundaries set by the sex worker themselves- Sex workers not believed when genuinely exploited because it's seen as all the same - IF WE BELIEVE WHEN SOMEONE SAYS THEYRE RAPED, WE MUST BELIEVE IT WHEN THEY SAY THEY ARE NOT

Here, you’ll be supported in progressing – whatever your ambitions.About the role: We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled Principal Quality Systems Engineer – Configuration Management to join our Global Capital Equipment Quality Assurance (QA) team at Boston Scientific. This position will play a key role in leading a strategic project related to Capital Equipment Configuration Management, which involves hardware, software, and systems configuration management. As the Technical Lead, you will partner closely with a Project Manager and work with cross-functional teams to help bring best-in-class practices related to configuration management into our Quality processes for capital equipment.This role will offer you the opportunity to engage with a diverse group of stakeholders, from engineers to leadership, across multiple divisions. You will help establish a unified approach to configuration management that spans the entire lifecycle of capital equipment, ensuring that our processes, policies, and systems are aligned with the highest standards of quality, compliance, and operational efficiency.Your responsibilities will include: Project Leadership: Serve as the Technical Lead for a strategic project focused on Capital Equipment Configuration Management, involving hardware, software, and systems configuration management, partnering with a Project Manager and cross-functional teams to drive successful outcomes. Configuration Management Expertise: Lead technical discussions and guide decision-making around configuration management for complex capital equipment, including hardware, software, and systems, ensuring best practices are followed throughout the lifecycle. Collaboration: Work alongside other project leads within the Capital Equipment QA portfolio to define a unified approach to configuration management-addressing inputs, considerations, outputs, and decisions across the equipment lifecycle. Documentation Development: Lead the creation and maintenance of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Work Instructions, and Guidance documents to ensure consistency and compliance across configuration management activities. Stakeholder Management: Lead a cross-functional, cross-divisional stakeholder group, including engineers, quality professionals, and senior leadership, to ensure alignmen

די נמאס!!!!📩 "אני שולחת מלא קו"ח ותיקי עבודות ואף אחד לא חוזר אליי..."🤯 "יש כל כך הרבה מועמדים, אבל אף אחד לא מתאים..."אם אתם מחפשי עבודה או מגייסים, בטח המשפטים האלה נשמעים לכם מוכרים.אז אולי די כבר?!🎯 הגיע הזמן לשנות את המשחק!מגייסים ומגייסות – בואו נהיה אלה שמובילים שינוי אמיתי.בחייאת, הרי כולם יעידו שהם "Team players" - אז אולי פשוט תדייקו את החיפוש שלכם?! החל ממחר, כשתפרסמו מודעת דרושים/ות, תוודאו שהיא כוללת:✅ תיאור של החברה – מי אתם ולמה שירצו לעבוד אצלכם?✅ דרישות ריאליות – איזה רקע, ידע קודם או השכלה נדרשים?✅ תיאור העבודה בפועל – מה בת'כלס עושים ביום-יום?✅ ממשקים – למי כפופים? עם צריך לעבוד? (פרודקט, פיתוח, QA וכו')✅ ציפיות מתיק העבודות – מה באמת חשוב לכם לראות בתוכו? (תהליך, מחקר, Design System, פתרון אתגרים?✅ שלבי הגיוס – כמה שלבים, מה הם כוללים? ומה המשך הצפוי?✅ Soft Skills ו-Professional Skills – עד ארבעה מכל סוג, לא יותר (הרי סופרוומן לא מחפשת עבודה) תהיו מדויקים.💡 זה לא רק יחסוך לכם זמן ויישפר את ההתאמות – זה גם יעשה טוב לשוק העבודה כולו.השינוי מתחיל כאן! שתפו את הפוסט, שיגיע לכמה שיותר מגייסים ומגייסות.כי הגיע הזמן לעשות את זה אחרת. 💪ותודה לשותפות בסיעור המוחות המרתק עם Tali Rosen Shoham Maeva Shalom Alice Cohen Sivana Sherlag 🎗️ hashtag#UX hashtag#Productdesign hashtag#UI hashtag#Jobdescription hashtag#hiring hashtag#HR hashtag#Recruiter

Securing the Future of the UK Food Industry: The Strategic Role of ApprenticeshipsWith the UK food and beverage sector employing over half a million people and contributing £38 billion to the economy annually, the industry’s success depends on a skilled, future-ready workforce. Yet, a national shortage of food scientists and technologists threatens long-term sustainability.Apprenticeships are emerging as a powerful solution—bridging the skills gap, fostering innovation, and providing businesses with a pipeline of specialized talent. Companies like Fera Science and Tesco are investing in structured training programs that equip the next generation with hands-on experience and industry-specific expertise. However, systemic change is needed. The proposed Growth and Skills Levy could play a pivotal role in reforming workforce development, ensuring apprenticeships remain a strategic asset for the sector.How can businesses and policymakers collaborate to enhance the impact of apprenticeships? Share your insights.hashtag#FoodIndustry hashtag#Apprenticeships hashtag#SkillsDevelopment hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#TalentPipeline

Making Aliyah with Kids: An Investment in Their FutureMoving to Israel with children can feel overwhelming. As parents, you might worry about jobs, finances, or adjusting to a new culture. But while there may be struggles along the way, making Aliyah is one of the best investments you can make for your children’s future.A Built-in Network for Success In Israel, connections (known as protektzia) play a huge role in finding jobs and opportunities. Children who grow up here naturally build friendships, attend school with future colleagues, and serve in the army or national service, forming bonds that last a lifetime. When it comes time to find a job, they’ll already know people in their field who can help them get a foot in the door.Affordable, High-Quality Education Unlike in the U.S., where university costs can be crushing, Israel offers world-class higher education at a fraction of the price. Many children of Olim attend university almost for free, thanks to government subsidies and scholarships. They can graduate without student debt, giving them a huge financial advantage.A Strong Social System Israel’s healthcare system is among the best in the world and is accessible to all residents. There are also generous benefits for young families, including tax breaks, free daycare options, and social programs that make life easier as they start their own families.While you as a parent may experience some challenges, your children will grow up fully integrated, fluent in Hebrew, and part of a society that values community and support. The struggles you face now are temporary, but the benefits for your children will last a lifetime.Aliyah is more than a move—it’s an investment in a brighter future for your family. And that’s worth everything.

This role is crucial in ensuring the stability, performance, and overall quality of our games. You will work closely with developers, designers, and other QA team members to identify issues, automate testing processes, and help optimize our QA workflow.The ideal candidate has a strong technical background in testing methodologies, scripting, and debugging, with a passion for gaming and a commitment to delivering high-quality player experiences.Key Responsibilities Develop and execute automated and manual test cases for game features, mechanics, and performance. Design, implement, and maintain test automation scripts for regression, functional, and performance testing. Work closely with developers to identify, reproduce, and document bugs using bug-tracking systems like JIRA. Collaborate with Engineering and developers to understand requirements and ensure test coverage. Participate in build validation, smoke testing, and integration testing for new features and patches. Analyze logs, crashes, and performance metrics to provide detailed reports on defects. Help establish best practices for test automation, QA workflows, and game testing methodologies. Assist in load testing and stress testing. Support continuous integration \(CI\) pipelines with automated tests to ensure stability in daily builds. QualificationsRequired 5+ years of experience in game testing 2+ years as QA engineering Proficiency with bug-tracking tools \(e.g., JIRA, TestRail, Bugzilla\). Experience with scripting languages such as Python, JavaScript, or C# for test automation. Familiarity with game engines like Unreal Engine Knowledge of game development processes, including agile workflows and version control systems \(Git, Perforce, SVN\). Ability to debug issues using logs, crash reports, and debugging tools. Strong understanding of game mechanics, networking, and performance optimization. Experience testing across PC Platforms Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail. Preferred Proficiency with C++ Experience in automated custom game automation frameworks. Knowledge of network testing, server-client interactions, and online game testing methodologies. Background in load testing and stress testing for multiplayer games. Familiarity with performance profiling tools like Unreal Insights. Understanding of accessibility testing and compliance standards as it relates to laws for each component under your jurisdiction. Interview Overview:Below you’ll find an outline of the interview plan for this role. Strong verbal and written communication skills Able to review and analyze system specifications (e.g. System Requirements, Business Requirements, Design Documents, etc.) Able to perform manual testing and/or automated testing using the supported tools.
